identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.vibe: Grounded, matte, physical. A digital extension of a cozy, aromatic coffee shop.

Content is King: Food photography is the hero.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for text. Use APCA for large text.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the custom colors (forest, sand, terracotta) to tailwind.config.js.
2. FONT SETUP: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'DM Sans' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. THEME STRATEGY: Use the 'Organic & Earthy' palette. Customer app = Light Mode (Sand/White). POS/Kitchen = Dark Mode (Charcoal/Forest).
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default radii, add custom borders. Make buttons pill-shaped.
5. LAYOUT: Use the 'Tetris' grid for the Menu. Use 'High Density' grid for POS.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Create depth with z-index and shadows.
